intro: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the White Scars Space Marine chapter or any of its successor chapters. The White Scars practice a highly mobile method of warfare, tearing into their enemies with lightning-quick attacks and vanishing before a response can be made.
strategy: Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
armyRules: The They Shall Know No Fear special rule applies to all White Scars detachments and Aircraft formations.

formations.name: Terminators
formations.units: Four Terminators, two Land Raider Crusaders
extraUnits: Replace up to two Land Raider Crusaders with two Land Raiders each: 50 points each

sections.name: White Scars Support Detachments
sections.description: Two Support Detachments may be taken per Core Detachment

formations.name: Land Speeder
formations.units: Any five of the following units: White Scars Land Speeder, White Scars Land Speeder Tornado

sections.name: White Scars Navy & Collegia Titanica Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Warhounds
extraUnits: Add an additional Warhound Titan: 200 points

upgrades.title: White Scars Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per detachment

items.name: Anti-Air
items.description: Add any one of the following units to the formation

items.name: Attack Bikes
items.description: Replace up to three White Scars Assault Bikes, or one White Scars Scout Bikes, with an equal number of White Scars Attack or Melta Bikes

items.name: Battle Barge
items.description: Replace the Strike Cruiser with a Battle Barge

items.name: Commander
items.description: Add any one of the following characters to any unit in the formation

items.name: Land Speeder Variants
items.description: Replace any number of White Scars Land Speeders with an equal number of White Scars Land Speeder Typhoons or White Scars Land Speeder Tempest

items.name: Razorbacks
items.description: Add any number of Razorbacks, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Vindicators
items.description: Add up to two White Scars Vindicators
